data.title: William (Bill) David Moore Obituary
data.meta_description: Celebrate the life of William (Bill) Moore, leave a kind word or memory and get funeral service information care of Markey-Dermody Funeral Home.
data.text: Passed away peacefully, after a brief but courageous battle with cancer on Wednesday, December 7, 2016 in his 79th year, surrounded by his family. Bill was a loving and devoted husband to Jeanette (nee Puffer) for 51 years and proud father of his three sons Jeff (Cathy), Greg (Marlo) and Rob (Sheila). “Papa Moo” will be sadly missed by his grandchildren, Caitlin, Jennifer, Connor, Caleb, Olivia and Mary. Bill was “the best big brother” to Sharon Cowman and will be missed by nephews David and Jim and niece Pat and their families. Bill was a loyal Dofasco employee for 32 years in the steel mill. Bill enjoyed golfing, going to lunch with friends, working out at the gym and accompanying Jeanette on their many travels. Special thanks to Dr. Trevor Kwok for his many years of care, St. Peter’s Hospital for their compassion and support, particularly Dr. Bev and nurses Anita, Deb, Carla and Theresa. Visitation at MARKEY-DERMODY FUNERAL HOME, 1774 King Street East (at Kenilworth) on Thursday from 2-4 pm and 7-9 pm. Visitation will continue on Friday, December 9, 2016 from 10 am until the time of Funeral Service at 11 am in the funeral home chapel. Interment to follow at White Chapel Memorial Gardens. For those who wish, memorial donations may be made to the Canadian Cancer Society or the Heart and Stroke Foundation.
